long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chicken Clicker is an addictive and fun clicker game where you raise chickens, collect eggs, and expand your farm! Start by clicking to produce eggs, then reinvest in upgrades, unlock new chickens, and grow your empire into a thriving poultry powerhouse. With simple mechanics and endless upgrades, Chicken Clicker is perfect for fans of idle and incremental games.
ü•ö Game Features:

    Egg-citing Gameplay: Click to collect eggs and watch your farm grow!
    Charming Chickens: Unlock unique chickens with special abilities to boost production.
    Farm Upgrades: Invest in barns, feeders, and hatcheries to maximize efficiency.
    Idle Rewards: Keep earning eggs even when you're offline.

Start your journey from a small coop to an egg empire in Chicken Clicker! Ready to rule the roost? Play now and start clicking! üêì
